function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct thorough evaluation and testing of bacs design and operation with adequate resources and level of detail","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of face masks to reduce the emission of speech droplets and aerosols, especially in indoor environments.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aggressively seeking alternative sources of goods and materials, submitting design alternates early, and diversifying supply chains.","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Internet-based communication and mental well-being support","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and improvement of sustainability standards, investment in green building technologies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper ventilation and air quality","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Portable air filters with uv sterilisation","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced cleaning and sanitization","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Account for the uncertainty inherent in risk","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular review and adaptation of strategies to suppress the spread of covid-19 in response to new virus variants.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mobilize informal institutions such as chws and community support groups to deliver health and general education","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strategic allocation of funds, assessment of security implications, and development of alternative financing mechanisms for environmental initiatives","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collect more comprehensive and diverse data sources for model calibration","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased testing, capacity expansion, and resource allocation","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcoming socioeconomic inequalities to ensure equal access to protective measures and resources.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Smart personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Careful consideration of spatial layout and allocation, and potentially rethinking the design of rear extensions to accommodate a containment space.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring, rapid response protocols","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct county-specific analysis to understand local determinants of covid-19 fatality rates and obesity prevalence","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict containment measures, promoting vaccination, and enforcing public health regulations","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote ecological awareness and sustainable development practices","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement crowd control measures, increase ventilation, and regularly disinfect high traffic areas","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promoting social distancing measures and public health guidelines","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustainable conservation practices, climate change adaptation strategies, and biodiversity protection measures","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of more advanced diagnostic testing methods like pooled-sample analysis and antigen testing","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote active transportation","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Include methods to account for unobserved heterogeneity, such as fixed effects or random effects models","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement health protocols such as physical distancing, barriers/partitions, and regular disinfection","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide targeted education and awareness campaigns","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing regulations, education on responsible purchasing","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement stricter and more effective home quarantine measures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishment of international guidelines and standards for wastewater monitoring and treatment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring of zoonotic diseases, development of preventive measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing optimal bacs design and functionalities to improve indoor air quality","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anonymization of sensitive data, regular security audits, and adherence to data privacy regulations","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Develop targeted recovery strategies based on the unique characteristics and needs of each city.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Innovation in the design and production of self-disinfecting ppe, testing and certification protocols, and education on proper usage","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of professional signage","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict adherence to bsl3 laboratory protocols and use of personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gloves that comply with safety standards, proper disposal of gloves after use","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automatic doors","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement hvac system adjustments for reduced occupancy, improve ventilation and air filtration systems, promote good indoor air quality practices","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide alternative data collection methods , telephone surveys, in-person interviews for those with limited internet access, and ensure accessibility features in online forms for diverse user groups.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement measures early, based on evidence and research","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reducing ambient pollutants and increasing green spaces","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide financial support to cultural and creative industries, promote digital cultural events and
